## map2 variable

Higher order word. Takes 2 values from d-stack and writes back result from given op. The arg order is (TOS, TOS-1)

( a b -- c )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
op2: (op: Fn2<any, any, any>) => (ctx: StackContext) => StackContext
```
